summary: This bill, HR 3761, mandates the Secretary of Defense to appoint a Coordinator for Engagement with PFAS-impacted defense communities. The coordinator will improve communication and outreach regarding perfluoroalkyl and polyfluoroalkyl substances (PFAS) contamination in current and former defense communities in the United States.  The coordinator will also serve as a liaison between the Department of Defense and local stakeholders involved in PFAS remediation efforts.
